description: Network, biobank or collection also exists in …

label: id
description: Unique ID

label: Name of the System
description: Name of the source in which the biobank, collection or network also exists

label: Persistent Identifier
description: Persistent Identifier of the biobank, collection or network in the other source

label: URL
description: Link to the biobank, collection or network in the other source

label: National Node
description: The biobank, collection or network where this also known in refers to originates from this national node

label: Withdrawn
description: The biobank, collection or network where this also known in refers to is withdrawn from the Directory

label: Label
description: Name of the source in which the biobank, collection or network also exists
Biobank Quality Information
Description of the biobank organisation, like name, location, network, contact persons, collaboration opportunities and quality assessments

label: Id
description: Unique biobank ID within BBMRI-ERIC based on MIABIS 2.0 standard (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 + underscore + biobank national ID or name), prefixed with bbmri-eric:ID: string - MIABIS-2.0-01.

label: PID
description: Persistent Identifier

label: Name
description: Biobank name according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-03.

label: Acronym
description: Biobank acronym - MIABIS-2.0-02.

label: Description
description: Biobank description - MIABIS-2.0-08.

label: URL
description: Biobank URL - MIABIS-2.0-04.

label: Location
description: The city where the biobank is located

label: Country
description: Country hosting the biobank according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-06.

label: Latitude
description: Latitude of the biobank in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is northern hemisphere.

label: Longitude
description: Longitude of the biobank in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is to the East of Greenwich.

label: Head of biobank
description: Person in charge of the collection.

label: Contact
description: Reference to a contact ID.

label: Juridical person
description: Juristic person of a biobank according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-05.

label: Networks
description: Reference to a biobank network ID, to which the biobank belongs; this attribute can also be used for biobank network, where it refers to the superior biobank network).

label: Also known in
description: Biobank also exists in …

label: Collections
description: Collections belonging to this biobank

label: Capabilities provided
description: Capabilities that the biobank organisation can offer to a researcher

label: Collaboration commercial
description: Biobank/collection can be used for collaboration with commercial partners.

label: Collaboration non for profit
description: Biobank/collection can be used for collaboration with non-for-profit partners.

label: National node
description: This biobank originates from this national node

label: Withdrawn
description: This biobank is withdrawn from the Directory
Collection Quality Information
Description of the data and samples collected within a biobank, collections may be divided in sub-collections

label: Descriptives
description: Collection Descriptives

label: Id
description: Unique collection ID within BBMRI-ERIC based on MIABIS 2.0 standard, constructed from biobankID prefix + :collection: + local collection ID string - MIABIS-2.0-01.

label: Name
description: Collection name according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-03.

label: Acronym
description: Collection acronym according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-02.

label: Description
description: Collection description according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-08.

label: URL
description: Collections URL - MIABIS-2.0-04.

label: Location
description: The city where the collection is located

label: Country
description: Country according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-H.

label: Latitude
description: Latitude of the biobank in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is northern hemisphere.

label: Longitude
description: Longitude of the biobank in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is to the East of Greenwich.

label: Head of collection
description: Person in charge of the collection.

label: Contact
description: Reference to a contact ID.

label: National node
description: The collection originates from this national node

label: Withdrawn
description: This collection is withdrawn from the Directory

label: Belongs to
description: Collection belongs to…

label: Parent collection
description: Reference to a collection ID, refers to the superior collection.

label: Sub collections
description: Sub Collections

label: Biobank
description: Reference to a biobank ID, to which the collection belongs.

label: Biobank label
description: Name of the Biobank

label: Network
description: Reference to a biobank network ID, to which the collection or biobank belongs; this attribute can also be used for biobank network, where it refers to the superior biobank network).

label: Combined_network
description: Reference to one or more network IDs, to which the collection belongs directly or indirectly (i.e., either the collection is explicitly marked as part of the network or its biobank is).

label: Also known in
description: Collection also exists in …

label: Characteristics
description: Characteristics

label: Type
description: Type(s) of collection - MIABIS-2.0-19.

label: Data categories
description: Denotes which types of data are available (MIABIS-2.0-13).

label: Order of magnitude
description: Size of the collection measured as 10n samples.

label: Size
description: Exact size of the collection to the given date.

label: Categories
description: Collection Categories

label: Timestamp
description: Date to which the size of the collection was valid, format: yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss+nnnn, e.g. 2016-11-15T09:53:13+0100.

label: Donor data
description: Donor Data

label: Number of donors
description: Number of donors from who sample(s) were taken

label: Order of magnitude donors
description: Size of the collection donor measured as 10n samples.

label: Sex
description: The sex of the individuals in the sample collection. - MIABIS-2.0-09.

label: Diagnosis available
description: Diagnosis available in the collection, with the ontology prefix, possibly using * and ? wildcards, and prefix notation to denote diagnosis nomenclature - so far urn:miriam:icd: prefix for ICD-10, and urn:miriam:snomedct: prefix for SNOMED CT (examples being urn:miriam:icd:C*, urn:miriam:snomedct:25*) - MIABIS-2.0-17, adapted.

label: Age low
description: Age of youngest sample donor at time of sample donation - MIABIS-2.0-10.

label: Age high
description: Age of oldest sample donor at time of sample donation - MIABIS-2.0-11.

label: Age unit
description: Unit defining Age Low and Age High. Can be one of the following values: years, months, weeks, days - MIABIS-2.0-08.

label: Facts
description: Facts

label: Sample data
description: Sample Data

label: Materials
description: Collection contains material(s) of this/these type(s) (MIABIS-2.0-14).

label: Storage temperatures
description: Sample storage temperature(s) - SPREC 2.0 (MIABIS-2.0-15).

label: Imaging data
description: Imaging Data

label: Body part examined
description: The examined body part(s).

label: Imaging modality
description: The imaging modality/modalities.

label: Image dataset type
description: Type(s) of the imaging dataset.

label: Policies
description: Policies

label: Collaboration commercial
description: Biobank/collection can be used for collaboration with commercial partners.

label: Collaboration non for profit
description: Biobank/collection can be used for collaboration with non-for-profit partners.

label: Data use
description: Data Use Ontology (DUO)

label: Available for commercial use
description: Can commercial users request access to samples and/or data

label: Fee-based access to
description: Denotes whether access to samples, data or images may be obtained on fee-based basis.

label: Access via join projects to
description: Denotes whether access to samples, data or images may be obtained on joint project basis.

label: Access description
description: Short description of Access Rules.

label: Access uri
description: URI describing the Access Policy.

label: PD/SOP
description: Availability of Process Descriptions (PDs) and/or Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)

label: Quality
description: Quality Information

label: Combined quality
description: Reference to one or more assessment levels, to which the collection belongs directly or indirectly (i.e., either the collection is explicitly marked with this assessment level or its biobank is).
All National Nodes

label: id
description: Unique national node ID (in most of the cases two letter country code)

label: description
description: Full name of the National Node

label: External DNS
description: In case data needs to be staged from an external server

label: Contact Persons
description: The contact person(s) with their roles

label: Data Refresh
description: How is the data updated?

label: Date Start
description: Date the national node is included in the Directory

label: Date End
description: Date the national node is no longer included the Directory
Description of the biobank networks, like name, contact information and all kinds of common agreements (access policies, charters, sops)

label: id
description: Unique ID of a biobank network within BBMRI-ERIC based on MIABIS 2.0 standard (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 +underscore + biobank national ID or name), prefixed with bbmri-eric:networkID: string; if biobank network is on European or higher level, EU_ prefix is to be used instead of country prefix.

label: Name
description: Biobank network name.

label: Acronym
description: Biobank network acronym.

label: Description
description: Biobank network description.

label: Location
description: The city where the network is located

label: Latitude
description: Latitude of the biobank in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is northern hemisphere.

label: Longitude
description: Longitude of the biobank in the WGS84 system (the one used by GPS), positive is to the East of Greenwich.

label: Also known in
description: This network is also known in

label: URL
description: Biobank network URL.

label: Juridical person
description: Juristic person of a biobank network to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-05.

label: Contact
description: Reference to a contact ID.

label: Parent network
description: Reference to a biobank network ID, refers to the superior biobank network.

label: Common Network Elements
description: Selection of elements that are the same for all biobanks/collections within the network

label: National node
description: The network originates from this national node

label: Withdrawn
description: This network is withdrawn from the Directory
Information on the contact persons of a biobank, collection of network, like name, address and e-mail address

label: id
description: Contact identifier, prefixed with bbmri-eric:contactID:

label: Title before Name
description: title_before_name, value "prof. mr."

label: First Name
description: First name according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-A.

label: Last Name
description: Last name according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-B.

label: Title after Name
description: value after name, value "Bsc."

label: Email
description: Email according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-D.

label: Phone
description: Phone number according to MIABIS 2.0 including international prefix (+99999999999 form with no spaces) compliant also to E.123 norm - MIABIS-2.0-07-C.

label: Address
description: Address according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-E.

label: Zip
description: ZIP or Postal code according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-F.

label: City
description: City according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-G.

label: Country
description: Country according to MIABIS 2.0 - MIABIS-2.0-07-H.

label: Role
description: Official role of the person.

label: National Node
description: The person originates from this national node

label: Withdrawn
description: This person is withdrawn from the Directory
Contact persons of the National Nodes

label: id
description: Unique ID

label: First name
description: First name of the contact person

label: Last name
description: Last name of the contact person

label: Email
description: Email address

label: Contact Role
description: Role of the contact person
Collection Facts table

label: id
description: Unique ID of the fact

label: Collection ID
description: ID of the collection

label: Sex
description: The sex of the individuals in the fact. Can be one of the following values: Male, Female, Unknown, Undifferrentiated, Not applicable

label: Age Range
description: Age range of the sample donors at time of sample donation

label: Sample Type
description: The biospecimen saved from a biological entity for propagation e.g. testing, diagnostics, treatment or research purposes.

label: Disease
description: The disease or disease category of main interest in the fact, if any. (Structured attribute)

label: NumberOfSamples
description: Number of Samples

label: NumberOfDonors
description: Number of Donors

label: Date of Last Update
description: The date the fact information was last updated in the source system

label: National Node
description: The collection this fact belongs to originates from this national node

label: Withdrawn
description: The collection this fact belongs to is withdrawn from the Directory
